sentence.Network_en: Latin and Greek will be squeezed out of school timetables.
sentence.Network_cn: 拉丁语和希腊语将退出学校的课程表。

sentence.Network_en: The children charged out of school.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子们一下冲出了学校.

sentence.Network_en: The children rushed out of school.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子们飞快地跑出学校.

list.abs: I ' ve been out of school so long I hardly remember ever going ., 我已经离开学校很久了 , 甚至有些不记得自己曾经上过学了.

prepare Yourself A story around campus has it that a student once sent a telegram to parents reading : " Mom-flunked all courses . kicked out of school . prepare Pop . " "自己做好准备校园里流传着这样的故事：一个学生一次给父母拍了一份电报，上面写着：“妈妈-我所有功课都不及格，被学校开除。让爸爸做好准备。”
